title: Computer randomly locking during loading
body:
Computer freezes. No sound, at all (i had music), cant move mouse and cant input anything. Happens at many percents of loading, but mainly on 0%


Need a fix asap, running windows 10, not anniversary update.
I'm in low priority queue because of this, and it forced so many losses... 
Seems to only happen duringascension.
After computer boots up again and lol up again, always, ALWAYS says "we've reverted this installation to a older version and were gonna patch it up to a newer version" , and never lets me log in, until 5 minutes after. When the games almost over... 
Please help :(

replies.body:
Since this weird thing keeps getting you kicked out of pvp matches, let's make sure to test anything in a custom or practice game so you don't get anymore penalties for leaving your teammates without a 5th member. 

It almost sounds like some of the game files might have become corrupted somehow. Let's make sure you've got a complete clean install of the game, so grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with reinstall and clean uninstall turned on.
Hello, thanks for the response! And sorry for being late. The thing has magically fixed itself, but as I said, it seems to only happen during Ascension. Will test this weekend.

Heeeeey let's not question that pc fixing magic ^_^! 

I'm glad it worked itself out, but definitely hit me back up if it ever starts happening again.

Hey, just happened again, definitely a problem with ascension, had no problems during the week with aram and normals. No problems with login though. Not sure if linked to specific champion in ascension, but crashes usually happen with me playing cho'gath. Had 2 crashes with udyr aswell.
